code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{auth}from'./firebase';import{sendPasswordResetEmail}from'firebase/auth';import'./PasswordReset.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PasswordReset=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const handlePasswordReset=async event=>{event.preventDefault();setMessage('');setError('');try{await sendPasswordResetEmail(auth,email);setMessage('Password reset email sent!
